appinfo.about:
Wnmp 2.0.2.7 ************
- Wnmp
* Added link to localhost * Added percent for update download progress * Fixed checking if application was already running when starting Wnmp and at other times * Other internal fixes and improvments
- PHP
* Updated to 5.4.19 * Now compiled with extra extensions (apc, apcu, Zend OPcache, etc.) and other stuff!
- Nginx
* Updated to 1.5.4
- phpMyAdmin
* Updated to 4.0.6
